item.title: Insiders Just Bought the Dip in NKE Stock, Including Apple's CEO
item.description: After investors dumped Nike stock post-earnings, insiders piled in. Nike's top leader wasn't the only big-name CEO to make a big-time purchase.

item.title: Why Chevron’s Venezuela Exposure Puts CVX Stock in Play for 2026
item.description: Chevron stock jumped after Venezuela’s political shift, but the real opportunity lies in CVX’s unique refining advantage and long-term oil strategy

item.title: IREN Limited: A Data Center Power Play in Rebound Mode

item.title: What’s Up With SentinelOne? An Ultra-Deep Value Opportunity
item.description: SentinelOne is well-positioned to rebound robustly in 2026 and then extend the gains in 2027 as growth and earnings drive a price-multiple expansion.
